0.title: Dafi Stretch Mark Cream
0.description:
• Eliminates the dryness of the soles of the feet, knees, hands and arms
  • Maintaining skin moisture by removing its dead layers and preparing the skin for better nutrition
  • Strong healing and emollient, softening, soothing and repairing skin roughness
  • Contains wonderful ingredients such as shea butter, vaseline, beeswax and allantoin
